presetNotes:
- Pre-summon Meerkats Familiar with scrolls in them

- Useful to skip wizards during coordinate clues

equipmentSlots.label: wickedhood
equipmentSlots.name: Wicked hood
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Allows you to teleport to Rune Altars and requires Wicked Hood Tokens to be charged | 
Used for Nature Altar

equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Disassemble any stackable/noted item for a chance of procs during a run

inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Any reward caskets obtained when completing a treasure trail, will automatically be stored in the clue carrier if it is worn or in the inventory

primaryRelics.name: Shadows Grace
primaryRelics.description: Reduces the cooldown of Surge, Escape, Bladed Dive, Dive and Barge by 50%, but these abilities no longer generate adrenaline.
primaryRelics.label: shadowsgrace

primaryRelics.name: Abyssal Link
primaryRelics.description: Teleport spells from the spellbook no longer require runes, but award no magic XP.
primaryRelics.label: abyssallink

primaryRelics.name: Persistent Rage
primaryRelics.description: Your adrenaline now generates outside of combat at a rate of 5% every 1.2 seconds, instead of having it drained.
primaryRelics.label: persistentrage
